title: Where did my Alpha Client go?
body: So I just finished a game on the alpha client then closed it out and came back and the alpha client was missing from my pc completely. Can someone explain?

replies.body:
It seems the shortcuts for the Alpha have been disappearing (even happened on my work PC) for some reason. However, the Alpha Client should still be installed and you should be able to find it in your installation locale: **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)**

Let me know if this helped.
I had the same problem. I shutdown the client before i was having lag issues in chat. after i closed it, puff its gone. I wonder if it has to do with the update
